name: Kabataan Youth Leadership Program
description: Kabataan (“Youth” in Filipino) is a youth leadership program that serves Filipino high school youth in San Francisco with the opportunities and skills needed in their own lives, schools, and communities. Through weekly educational and skill development workshops, Filipino cultural activities, team building, and community field trips - youth develop leadership skills they can use both in school and in the community. Through Kabataan Youth Leadership Program, FCC offers High School Volunteer/Commu
